class_6.subject: Math
class_6.title: Whole Numbers
class_6.description: Introduction to whole numbers and number line.

quiz.question: What is the smallest whole number?

class_6.subject: Science
class_6.title: Components of Food
class_6.description: Understand nutrients like carbohydrates, proteins, and fats.

quiz.question: Which nutrient provides energy to the body?

class_6.subject: English
class_6.title: Sentences
class_6.description: Learn about sentence structure and types.

class_7.title: Fractions and Decimals
class_7.description: Introduction to fractions and decimal calculations.

quiz.question: What is 1/2 written as a decimal?

class_7.subject: Science
class_7.title: Nutrition in Plants
class_7.description: How plants prepare their own food via photosynthesis.

quiz.question: The process by which plants make food is called ______.

class_7.subject: Science
class_7.title: Acids, Bases and Salts
class_7.description: Introduction to chemical nature of substances.

quiz.question: What is the taste of acids?

class_7.subject: English
class_7.title: Parts of Speech - Nouns
class_7.description: Learn about different types of nouns.

quiz.question: Which of these is a Proper Noun?

class_8.subject: Math
class_8.title: Rational Numbers
class_8.description: Properties and operations on rational numbers.

quiz.question: A number in the form p/q where q is not 0 is called ______.
